Text: just a quick question... what do i need in order to use one torrents audio and a different torrents video to make one good english movie? i'll figure out how to use stuff if NE1 can tell me what i need to get... thanks.
To dead_pirate_st3v3. You just need MKVTOOLNIX. You can download it for free .Works with avi ,mkv ,wmv files. Just make sure that your video files have the same frame rate [ FPS].
